title: Announcing Paramount+ & Leo Deblin's Streaming Plus+ Hustle | Kelly Marie Tran
itunes:title: Announcing Paramount+ & Leo Deblin's Streaming Plus+ Hustle | Kelly Marie Tran
description:
Trevor looks at the state of the minimum wage in the U.S., Leo Deblin (Roy Wood Jr.) introduces his unique streaming service, and actor Kelly Marie Tran discusses "Raya and the Last Dragon."


In honor of Women's History Month, support more women running for public office by visiting dailyshow.com/SheShouldRun.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
